name: Amanda Leigh Lichtenstein
bio: Amanda Leigh Lichtenstein is a poet, writer, and editor who splits her time between Chicago and Zanzibar. She has written for Al Jazeera English, Public Radio International, CNN, Atlas Obscura, Global Voices, and National Public Radio, among others. Her literary work has appeared in Lillith, Hypertext, Proximity, Punch Drunk Press, and Fortunate Traveller.
